group_1.narration: <On the day after Shizuka and her friends@broke into Cleopatra's palace…>

group_1.textLeft: You're positive it happened at Cleopatra's@palace?

group_1.textRight: Indeed, after last night's infiltration, the Soul@Vessel collected some of Iroha's concept.
Then there's no question about it.

group_1.textLeft: But that leaves us with another…@Is Cleopatra really a Magical Girl or not?

group_1.textRight: Yes, it seems the scope of our investigation@has expanded.
For sure…
Queen Cleopatra and…Ebony, was it?
We need to follow both of them…

group_1.textLeft: Well, you're not wrong, but it's not too big@of a deal.
If I remember right, that Ebony chick said@something like…

group_1.textRight: Then I shall introduce myself. I am Ebony!
I was sent by the Met Clan to protect the queen!
In other words, she's a servant who's always@around Cleopatra, yeah?
So if we look for Cleopatra, that girl will be@right there with her!

group_1.textLeft: That's true…
But what she said about the "Met Clan" has@me concerned.

group_1.textRight: Judging from that conversation,
I believe it pertains in some way to a Magical@Girl's contract.
We'll have to investigate that matter in order@to determine the Magical Girl we need.

group_1.textLeft: It could be Ebony or maybe Cleopatra…
And there might be even more Magical Girls…@We can't leave any stone unturned!
…In any case, I'll look into Cleopatra again.
This time, I'll do so from a distance.
While that's underway, we'll have some of us@investigate the Met Clan.

group_1.textRight: …Yeah, that about sums it up.
So how are you gonna approach Cleopatra@this time?

group_1.textLeft: Chika, can I ask you to use your magic?

group_1.textRight: Right, there were many birds flying to and fro@around the palace…
I'll ask them to help us gather information!

group_1.textLeft: Sunao, you'll provide Chika with support.

group_1.textRight: I shall!

group_1.textLeft: Ryoko, Charu, you're with me pursuing@the Met Clan.

group_1.textRight: Roger that!
Should we make that "additional move" too?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah…be prepared.

group_1.narration: <Shizuka and the others take action once more.>
<Chika gathers information from the birds@who visit the palace.>
<The information comes in small fragments,@but she and Sunao feed it back to their team,@adding more context to their inquiries@around the city.>
<This cycle of steady research culminates in…>

group_1.textRight: Oh, Shizuka!
Sunao told me she received some key@information!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I was just about to tell you!
We finally found someone with connections@to the Met Clan!

group_1.textRight: Great job, you guys!

group_1.textLeft: We'll be meeting with them tonight!

group_1.textRight: This is the moment of truth!

group_1.textLeft: Still…
We better not let our guards down.
